name: Chess Knight 2
description: A medieval world of strategy and tactics await you to engage in epic battles of wits as you master the moves and the strategies in a conquest to claim the kingdom of Chess.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP Service Pack 2 (SP2), Vista, 7, 8, 10 Processor: 1.0 GHz Memory: 1 GB RAM Graphics: vCard with DirectX 9.0 support Storage: 300 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8, 10 Processor: 1.0 GHz Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: vCard with DirectX 9.0 support Storage: 300 MB available space

reviews.review_text: Very nice music and a decent look and feel, but not worth 5 bucks.  The game lacks depth, only has 3 chess sets, and doesn't support online multiplayer.  I also don't understand why in god's name would you put the credits on a board and continually rotate it, making it impossible to read.
